title: Connecting to Redis from a Jakarta EE application
content: In this tutorial, weâ€™ll learn how to integrate Redis into a Jakarta EE application using the Lettuce client library. Redis is a powerful in-memory data structure store, often used as a cache, message broker, or database. Lettuce is a popular Java client for Redis, providing both synchronous and asynchronous capabilities. We will use a simple ...  The post appeared first on .
